entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
